publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3802 Ms Margaret Curran: Special Grant Report No.1: Special Grant for Scotland Asylum Seeker Assistance - Report by Scottish Ministersâ€”That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of Special Grant Report No.1: Special Grant for Scotland Asylum Seeker Assistance - Report by Scottish Ministers (SE/2003/15), recommends that the report be approved.Supported by: Des McNulty*
